name: Shortcut
description: Integrate with Shortcut to list, create, search and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Stories
tools.description: List stories in a Shortcut project. Returns story names, types, states, and assignees.

tools.name: Create Story
tools.description: Create a new story in Shortcut. Specify name, project, story type, description, and optional fields.

tools.name: Search Stories
tools.description: Search for stories across Shortcut using a text query. Returns matching stories with IDs, names, and types.

tools.name: List Projects
tools.description: List all projects in Shortcut. Returns project names, IDs, and story counts.

tools.name: List Epics
tools.description: List all epics in Shortcut. Returns epic names, states, and story counts.
